content.text:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
To involve parent volunteers and older students in children's activities to facilitate involvement in focused, complex play:

1. Create a volunteer schedule for parents and older students
2. Train volunteers on how to guide complex play without taking over
3. Assign specific roles to volunteers (e.g., materials manager, play facilitator)
4. Design multi-age activities that encourage collaboration
5. Set up play stations with varying complexity levels
6. Provide prompts and open-ended questions for volunteers to use
7. Rotate volunteers through different play areas
8. Encourage volunteers to model problem-solving and critical thinking
9. Host regular reflection sessions with volunteers to discuss observations
10. Celebrate and showcase the complex play achievements of children
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
